Package equipments.CookingPlate

Interface CookingPlateUserCI

All Superinterfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, CookingPlateImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
CookingPlateConnector, CookingPlateInboundPort, CookingPlateOutboundPort
public interface CookingPlateUserCI extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, CookingPlateImplementationI
The component interface CookingPlateUserCI defines the services a cooking plate component offers and that can be required from it.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant
